q: , and Sergey Brin ran the company together- or not together, as the case may be. Sergey Brin and Page didn't just hire those Firefox devs on their own. They acquired entire companies on their own. One day Larry and Sergey Brin bought Android, and I didn't even notice, Eric Schmidt said in 2009. " Sergey Brin found Google Earth one day while he was surfing on the web. NBA.com staff reports-- Allen Iverson 's season is over. The Detroit Red Pistons said Friday the All-Star guard will miss the rest of the season-- and the playoffs if they make it-- because of a sore back. After talking with Allen Iverson and our medical staff, we feel that resting Allen Iverson for the remainder of the season is the best course of action at this time, Pistons president of basketball operations Joe Dumars said in a statement released by the team.
